name: Furious Adventure
description:
Get mad, get angry, get annoyed!

4 levels of increasing difficulty. Use Space to Jump, J to shoot

3 lives

Playable with XBOX controllers

Citations:

Background music: https://pixabay.com/music/upbeat-bgm003-a-lofi-dark-electro-idm-industrial-11396...

Hit sound effect: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/hit/ "Cartoon blow impact"

Enemy shooting sound effect: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/space-shooter/ "Boss fight arcade"

Player shooting sound effect: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/magic/ "Magic Bubbles spell"
